functions.function_ast:
FuncDef(
  decl=
    Decl(
      name='main',
      quals=[],
      align=[],
      storage=[],
      funcspec=[],
      type=
        FuncDecl(
          args=
            ParamList(
              params[0]=
                Typename(
                  name=None,
                  quals=[],
                  align=None,
                  type=
                    TypeDecl(
                      declname=None,
                      quals=[],
                      align=None,
                      type=
                        IdentifierType(
                          names=['void'],
                        )
                    )
                )
            )
          type=
            TypeDecl(
              declname='main',
              quals=[],
              align=None,
              type=
                IdentifierType(
                  names=['int'],
                )
            )
        )
    )
  body=
    Compound(
      block_items[0]=
        Decl(
          name='debut',
          quals=[],
          align=[],
          storage=[],
          funcspec=[],
          type=
            TypeDecl(
              declname='debut',
              quals=[],
              align=None,
              type=
                IdentifierType(
                  names=['int'],
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[1]=
        Decl(
          name='fin',
          quals=[],
          align=[],
          storage=[],
          funcspec=[],
          type=
            TypeDecl(
              declname='fin',
              quals=[],
              align=None,
              type=
                IdentifierType(
                  names=['int'],
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[2]=
        Decl(
          name='compteur',
          quals=[],
          align=[],
          storage=[],
          funcspec=[],
          type=
            TypeDecl(
              declname='compteur',
              quals=[],
              align=None,
              type=
                IdentifierType(
                  names=['int'],
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[3]=
        Decl(
          name='somme',
          quals=[],
          align=[],
          storage=[],
          funcspec=[],
          type=
            TypeDecl(
              declname='somme',
              quals=[],
              align=None,
              type=
                IdentifierType(
                  names=['int'],
                )
            )
          init=
            Constant(
              type='int',
              value='0',
            )
        )
      block_items[4]=
        FuncCall(
          name=
            ID(
              name='printf',
            )
          args=
            ExprList(
              exprs[0]=
                Constant(
                  type='string',
                  value='"Saisir la valeur de debut: "',
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[5]=
        FuncCall(
          name=
            ID(
              name='scanf',
            )
          args=
            ExprList(
              exprs[0]=
                Constant(
                  type='string',
                  value='"%i"',
                )
              exprs[1]=
                UnaryOp(
                  op='&',
                  expr=
                    ID(
                      name='debut',
                    )
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[6]=
        FuncCall(
          name=
            ID(
              name='printf',
            )
          args=
            ExprList(
              exprs[0]=
                Constant(
                  type='string',
                  value='"Saisir la valeur de fin: "',
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[7]=
        FuncCall(
          name=
            ID(
              name='scanf',
            )
          args=
            ExprList(
              exprs[0]=
                Constant(
                  type='string',
                  value='"%i"',
                )
              exprs[1]=
                UnaryOp(
                  op='&',
                  expr=
                    ID(
                      name='fin',
                    )
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[8]=
        For(
          init=
            Assignment(
              op='=',
              lvalue=
                ID(
                  name='compteur',
                )
              rvalue=
                ID(
                  name='debut',
                )
            )
          cond=
            BinaryOp(
              op='<=',
              left=
                ID(
                  name='compteur',
                )
              right=
                ID(
                  name='fin',
                )
            )
          next=
            UnaryOp(
              op='p++',
              expr=
                ID(
                  name='compteur',
                )
            )
          stmt=
            Compound(
              block_items[0]=
                If(
                  cond=
                    BinaryOp(
                      op='==',
                      left=
                        BinaryOp(
                          op='%',
                          left=
                            ID(
                              name='compteur',
                            )
                          right=
                            Constant(
                              type='int',
                              value='2',
                            )
                        )
                      right=
                        Constant(
                          type='int',
                          value='0',
                        )
                    )
                  iftrue=
                    Compound(
                      block_items[0]=
                        Assignment(
                          op='+=',
                          lvalue=
                            ID(
                              name='somme',
                            )
                          rvalue=
                            ID(
                              name='compteur',
                            )
                        )
                    )
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[9]=
        If(
          cond=
            BinaryOp(
              op='==',
              left=
                BinaryOp(
                  op='%',
                  left=
                    ID(
                      name='debut',
                    )
                  right=
                    Constant(
                      type='int',
                      value='2',
                    )
                )
              right=
                Constant(
                  type='int',
                  value='1',
                )
            )
          iftrue=
            Compound(
              block_items[0]=
                Assignment(
                  op='=',
                  lvalue=
                    ID(
                      name='debut',
                    )
                  rvalue=
                    BinaryOp(
                      op='+',
                      left=
                        ID(
                          name='debut',
                        )
                      right=
                        Constant(
                          type='int',
                          value='1',
                        )
                    )
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[10]=
        For(
          init=
            Assignment(
              op='=',
              lvalue=
                ID(
                  name='compteur',
                )
              rvalue=
                ID(
                  name='debut',
                )
            )
          cond=
            BinaryOp(
              op='<=',
              left=
                ID(
                  name='compteur',
                )
              right=
                ID(
                  name='fin',
                )
            )
          next=
            Assignment(
              op='=',
              lvalue=
                ID(
                  name='compteur',
                )
              rvalue=
                BinaryOp(
                  op='+',
                  left=
                    ID(
                      name='compteur',
                    )
                  right=
                    Constant(
                      type='int',
                      value='2',
                    )
                )
            )
          stmt=
            Compound(
              block_items[0]=
                Assignment(
                  op='=',
                  lvalue=
                    ID(
                      name='somme',
                    )
                  rvalue=
                    BinaryOp(
                      op='+',
                      left=
                        ID(
                          name='somme',
                        )
                      right=
                        ID(
                          name='compteur',
                        )
                    )
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[11]=
        FuncCall(
          name=
            ID(
              name='printf',
            )
          args=
            ExprList(
              exprs[0]=
                Constant(
                  type='string',
                  value='"La somme des nombres pairs: %i\\n"',
                )
              exprs[1]=
                ID(
                  name='somme',
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[12]=
        Return(
          expr=
            Constant(
              type='int',
              value='0',
            )
        )
    )
)
